greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Simple self-inverse permutation of natural numbers: after zero, list each block of A219661(n) numbers in reverse order, from A226061(n+1) to A219665(n).
comment: This permutation can be used to map between the sequences A219666 and A230416. E.g. A219666(n) = A230416(a(n)) and vice versa: A230416(n) = A219666(a(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..3149
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
xref: Analogous sequence for binary system: A218602.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 22 2013
